name: Back To The Dark
description:
Do you enjoy dungeonering in the... dark? 
How about when the dark is even... darker? 
Then you'll love Back To The Dark! A dungeon delving demake demo.

Singleplayer demo of a medieval-fantasy extraction melee-looter with the occasional arrow and spell. 

Can you survive the encroaching dark long enough to extract through a blue escape portal? Or will you be forced to delve deeper in the darkness through a red portal?

Oh and don't forget to loot some treasure.

(Note: Early gameplay demo!)

Features
  • 6 Playable Classes: 
    • Soldier
    • Archer
    • Marauder
    • Mage
    • Thief
    • Monk
  • Multiple weapons per class, with chained attacks!
  • 2 Dungeons
  • Various monster types
  • Potions
  • Jewellery
  • XP, levels, attributes!
  • Treasure!
Not Yet Included
  • Armour
  • Skills
  • Perks
  • Spiders!
  • "Useful" spells
  • More weapons
  • More treasure
  • Better lighting
  • More dungeons!
Controls

Mouse + Keyboard recommended, but twin-stick controller support included.

  • Aim : Mouse / Right Stick
  • Attack/Use Item : Left Mouse / Right Trigger
  • Movement: WASD Keys / Left Stick
  • Walk : Shift Key / Left Trigger
  • Interact : F Key / B Button
  • Cycle Weapons/Items: 1/2/3/4 Keys  / Left/Right Shoulder Buttons
  • Unequip Item : X Key
  • Drop Item : Right Mouse / X Button
  • Inventory : Tab Key / Y Button
  • Menu: Escape Key / Start Button
  • Menu Navigation: Mouse / Left Stick

Disclaimer: This demo is intended as a fun parody of existing video game tropes, etc.
